forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy this morning, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, becoming sunny in the afternoon. High near 20C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early, becoming sunny in the afternoon. High 69F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 52F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 6C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High around 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 41F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 42F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
